name: KEEP THE POWER
description:
## KEEP THE POWER

You believe that only with a strong hand can your country become great. Keep the power, try to delay your inevitable downfall by suppressing the free speech! Keep your loyal dogs well.. or don't

*Known issues*
The text might go offscreen. I tried to fix it, but if it still looks off to you try a windows build!

*Controls:*

A/D or arrows to move. Mouse to make strategic choices (when prompted)

Made for Ludum Dare 50 in 48h

Chagnelog:
* v 1.0.1 update Canvas scaler to scale UI with screen size
* v 1.2.0 after jam update: in-world UI for metrics; better SFX; better election UI; extended basic loop
